torch.name: Torch
torch.description: A wooden torch wrapped in oil-soaked rags. Provides light in dark places.

health_potion.name: Health Potion
health_potion.description: A small vial of red liquid that restores 25 health.

rusty_sword.name: Rusty Sword
rusty_sword.description: A simple, but effective, rusty sword.

leather_armor.name: Leather Armor
leather_armor.description: A sturdy set of boiled leather armor.

rusty_pickaxe.name: Rusty Pickaxe
rusty_pickaxe.description: A simple, rusty pickaxe. Better than nothing.

lockpick.name: Lockpick
lockpick.description: A set of slender metal tools used for picking locks. Requires a steady hand.

stick.name: Stick
stick.description: A sturdy stick, suitable for various uses.

cloth_scrap.name: Cloth Scrap
cloth_scrap.description: A small piece of torn cloth.

leather_scrap.name: Leather Scrap
leather_scrap.description: A scrap of leather, possibly from a defeated animal or old armor.

thread.name: Thread
thread.description: A spool of sturdy thread for sewing.

iron_ore.name: Iron Ore
iron_ore.description: A chunk of raw, unrefined iron ore.

copper_ore.name: Copper Ore
copper_ore.description: A chunk of rock containing veins of copper.

brass_ore.name: Brass Ore
brass_ore.description: A yellowish ore that looks like a mix of copper and zinc.

bronze_ore.name: Bronze Ore
bronze_ore.description: A dull, reddish-brown ore containing traces of copper and tin.

steel_ore.name: Steel Ore
steel_ore.description: A rare, natural formation of iron and carbon that resembles steel.

titanium_ore.name: Titanium Ore
titanium_ore.description: A lightweight, dark grey ore that is surprisingly durable.

mithril_ore.name: Mithril Ore
mithril_ore.description: A silvery, feather-light ore that hums with faint magical energy.

adamantite_ore.name: Adamantite Ore
adamantite_ore.description: An incredibly dense and hard black ore, almost impossible to break.

iron_ingot.name: Iron Ingot
iron_ingot.description: A solid bar of refined iron, ready for smithing.

copper_ingot.name: Copper Ingot
copper_ingot.description: A solid bar of refined copper.

titanium_ingot.name: Titanium Ingot
titanium_ingot.description: A bar of refined, lightweight titanium.

mithril_ingot.name: Mithril Ingot
mithril_ingot.description: A feather-light bar of shimmering, refined mithril.

adamantite_ingot.name: Adamantite Ingot
adamantite_ingot.description: A bar of incredibly dense and durable adamantite.

dragonite_ingot.name: Dragonite Ingot
dragonite_ingot.description: A bar of refined dragonite, shimmering with iridescent power.

celestial_steel_ingot.name: Celestial Steel Ingot
celestial_steel_ingot.description: A bar of refined celestial steel that glows with a soft, internal light.

primordial_steel_ingot.name: Primordial Steel Ingot
primordial_steel_ingot.description: A bar of refined primordial steel that seems to bend reality at its edges.

iron_sword.description: A sword forged from solid iron.
